name: Usha Janome Allure 75-Watt Sewing Machine (White/Blue)
description:
AZ sewing machine with 30 stitch functions of which the main ones are stretch stitching, four step button holing, button fixing, rolled hemming, blind stitch hemming, zip fixing
					
						 Lightweight and comes with a carrying handle
					
						 Colour coded functional face plate and two dials for pattern and stitch length selection
					
						 Free arm machine which allows for circular stitching
					
						 Warranty: 2 years on product
					
						 Power: 75 watts; Operating voltage: 230 volts
					
						 Includes: Sewing machine, Paddle, Power cord, Instruction manual, Instruction manual and Warranty card
